Module it.polimi.ingsw.am16
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am16.common.util

Record Class Position

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
it.polimi.ingsw.am16.common.util.Position
Record Components:
x - x-coordinate of the point.
y - y-coordinate of the point.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public record Position(int x, int y) extends Record implements Serializable
Record used to keep track of coordinates on game boards.

      public Position addOffset(Position offset)

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object o)
      Checks equality between tho positions. Two Position objects are equal if both the x coordinates match and the y coordinates match.
      Specified by:
      equals in class Record
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the result of the equality check.
